name: Nothing Between Us...
description:
"If you fulfil the specifications of my game, then I'll send you both home ♥"

Waking up in an unknown, tiny room, 16 year old Flow is thrown into a bizarre situation unfitting his typical, uneventful life. With only the quirky and eternally-joyful Chinamu as his company, he must do his best to discover the meaning behind the vague instructions given to them and escape.

Nothing Between Us... is a short 1-room comedic escape game created by Colonel using the RPG Maker VX Ace engine, and was first released on the 18th of July 2022. The English version was translated by HiragiHOUX, and released on the  10th of October 2022.

Explore the room,  communicate with your partner, and try to discover how to escape before it's too late!

The game takes 40~+ minutes, with three endings.

This game contains sexual themes and dialogue regarding/involving an underage character, infrequent violence, discussion of possibly disturbing content, and bad language.

Characters Flow The game’s protagonist. A serious boy who just wants to return home.

   

Chinamu A man trapped in the room with Flow. He has a severe lack of common sense or rationality. Other Versions

Japanese Version
